subtask.objective: Include a review or feedback collection process after deployment to ensure continuous improvement.
subtask.scope: As suggested by the verification process

verification.completion_summary: The collected research findings thoroughly address the inclusion of feedback and review processes post-deployment, with detailed insights on AI integration, evaluation frameworks, best practices, and case studies, demonstrating a comprehensive approach to continuous improvement.

covered_aspects: Implementation of feedback and review processes after deployment
Evaluation frameworks and systematic assessment methods
Best practices for deploying and maintaining AI agents in ITSM
Real-world case studies demonstrating feedback collection and continuous improvement
Guidelines for monitoring, performance evaluation, and iterative enhancement
